title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Project-Based Learning and Neoliberal Capitalism—A Critical Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Analyze potential impacts of neoliberal logic (individualism, competition, commodification, etc.) when designing project-based learning
Design one or more project-based learning activities reflecting educational equity and social responsibility through critical reflection
Propose methods to execute mobile-optimized language PBL tasks using only smartphones without collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
